meanings.definition: A person who adjusts or makes changes
meanings.sent1: The adjusters came to fix the broken machine.
meanings.sent2: The adjusters at the workshop are skilled at fixing things.
meanings.sent3: The adjusters decided to throw a party to celebrate their successful repairs.
meanings.sent4: She was like the adjusters of emotions, always finding the right balance.
meanings.sent5: The adjusters worked tirelessly to ensure everything was just right.

meanings.definition: Devices or mechanisms used to make adjustments or changes
meanings.sent1: The camera adjusters helped capture the perfect shot.
meanings.sent2: The adjusters on the thermostat control the room temperature.
meanings.sent3: The adjusters in the car dashboard looked like tiny buttons.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a set of adjusters, fine-tuning every detail.
meanings.sent5: The adjusters on the sound system made the music sound amazing.
